#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#define ll unsigned long int
using namespace std;
 
ll L (ll n);
 
int main()
{
	ll p,s,t,q;
	cin>>t;
	for(ll i=0; i<t; i++)
    {
        cin>>p;
        s=p*4;
        q=L(s);
        if(q==p)
            cout<<s<<endl;
        else
        {
            while(q!=p)
            {
                s++;
                q=L(s);
                if(q==p)
                    cout<<s<<endl;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
 
ll L (ll n)
{
    float divf=n/5;
int p=divf;
 
while((int)(divf))
{
    divf=divf/5;
    p=p+divf;
}
 
return p;
}
